To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Thrusting _thrusting;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_thrusting = Thrusting(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_thrusting.IsReady)
{
    var period = _thrusting.Period.Value;
    var current = _thrusting.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.thrusting = self.Thrusting(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.thrusting.IsReady:
    period = self.thrusting.Period.Value
    current = self.thrusting.Current.Value
